annotations.description: With Endgame out, I thought it was time to toast the man at the center of it all, Tony Stark, with this Lagavulin Last Word. ********************************...
annotations.title: Avengers EndGame Inspired Cocktail | How to Drink

textContent:
• 1 oz. Lagavulin 16
• 1 oz. Maraschino
• 1 oz. Chartreuse
• 1 oz. Lemon Juice

Shake and double strain into coupe
Top with fresh pepper

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=fJKXDilBAVA
title: The Endgame
